text: Filippo Luigi Penati (30 December 1952 â€“ 9 October 2019) was an Italian politician. He was born in Monza. He was mayor of Sesto San Giovanni between 1994 and 2001 and president of the Province of Milan between 2004 and 2009. He died in Sesto San Giovanni, aged 66. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Lombardy Category:Italian mayors Category:People from Monza
title: Filippo Penati
